english.segment1: vs1. put your head upon my shoulder. lay the hammer at your side. storms inside this tiny artist. dream in marble, shapes and light
english.segment2: forging through to whats becoming. so much wearing at your heart. though the knife and chisel break you. there will be a work of art
english.segment3: ch. you are throwing yourself at the stone. cause you see the shape and the form of his face. what your hands cannot break. and david waits
english.segment4: vs2. speaking words over the darkness. like the artist of the earth. in the image, daughter, father. your creation your rebirth
english.segment6: bridge. on the other side of brokenness. the way your heart connects to his. both must be free for the beauty to be revealed.
